welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sandton, the vibrant heart of South Africa's economic hub. Known for its towering skyscrapers, world-class shopping, and lively nightlife, we invite you to experience all the charm and excitement this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore everything Sandton has in store for you!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, dedicated to regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
